title: How to Earn a Samaritan Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Help out your fellow villagers in your town.
steps.description:
Bronze rank: Help 50 villagers
Silver rank: Help 100 villagers
Gold rank: Help 300 villagers

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on sunny days.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons.

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Help out your fellow villagers in your town. Bronze rank: Help 50 villagers
Silver rank: Help 100 villagers
Gold rank: Help 300 villagers Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on sunny days. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons. View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
